Description: Active violation case file related to building certification, if applicable

Active - Building Certification exists and is not expired with an inspection result of: Safe with repair, Safe, or Certified.
Expired - Previous valid certification is expired and requires re-inspection.
Deficient - The most recent fire safety or electrical maintenance certification was returned with a deficient status.
